definition[0]: someone who is extremely interested in a particular subject so that other people think they are strange or unusual
definition[1]: someone who is considered to be very strange because of the way they look, behave, or think
example[3]: These glasses make me look like a freak.
example[4]: Women who studied engineering used to be considered freaks.
definition[2]: something in nature that is very unusual
example[5]: Due to some freak of nature, it snowed in June.
definition[3]: an unexpected and very unusual event
example[6]: By some freak of fate, he walked away from the crash completely unhurt.
example[7]: Aprilâ€™s sales figures were a freak.
example[9]: He was crushed to death in a freak accident.
example[10]: The men drowned when a freak wave sank their boat.
definition[5]: to become suddenly angry or afraid, especially so that you cannot control your behaviour
example[11]: When Ben heard about the accident, he just freaked.
